Question: Neil Alden **** (August 5, 1930 – August 25, 2012) was an American astronaut and the first person to walk on the Moon.
Hints: This person served on two spaceflight accident investigations.
In the entire Apollo 11 photographic record, there are only five images of this person partly shown or reflected.
The Justice of the Peace read from an unrepealed 400-year-old law that required him to hang any this person found in the town.
